casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Dooley, Appellant, v. Norris, Clerk, Appellee.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Dooley, v. Norris (1987), 30 Ohio St. 3d 48.]

(No. 86-1181 Decided April 15, 1987.) John A. Dooley, pro se. Lee C. Falke, prosecuting attorney, and Sharon L. Ovington, for appellee. Per Curiam.

The judgment of the court of appeals denying costs to appellant is affirmed.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
